Class ReconnectPlayerCommand

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.game_commands.ReconnectPlayerCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameCommand, GamesManagerCommand, Serializable
public class ReconnectPlayerCommand extends Object implements GamesManagerCommand
Concrete command used to reconnect a player to a game.
